description:
This course is fun! You will learn to use your imagination with various tools for remembering people's names, strings of numbers, lists, facts, scripts, speeches, presentations and more. This includes our Spaced Repetition study method, which makes long term memory easy and fun. Our students are blown away at how fast, fun and easy it is, one you set your imagination free! The tools you will learn are fun to use, usually bringing a smile to your face.
SuperMemory is great for:
- Students wanting to get really high grades (in less time)
- Business types needing to remember customer names and product facts.
- Techies wanting to remember facts, figures, procedures

All the methods are flexible, meaning they adapt to almost any situation, and can be personalized by you if desired.
It's not rocket science - it's really fun and it works.

Great news - most of the tools can be learned in less than an hour, and with a bit of casual practice mastered in days!

Hey - everyone wants a better memory. These tools are fun to use, quick to learn and work really well.
title: SuperMemory - How to Remember Anything
